Text:
Thanks a lot for the big effort you're going through with this.

If you have enough volunteers, I'd suggest a three-step procedure, with three teams: transcribe, correct possible mispells and edit&format.
Thanks so much!! I am willing to help if you need it.

What happened to chapters 2-10?  I stopped reading the picture version because of the poor quality and strain on my eyes to try to read it.  I really appreciate what you (or you guys) are doing, but I would like ch 2-10.  I know I probably won't be able to finish the whole book before the release even if it was available, but I would like to get a head start.

I would love you forever!
